title: California halts operations of self-driving Cruise robotaxis
description: California Department of Motor Vehicles said Tuesday it was immediately suspending the permits that allowed the tech startup Cruise to operate driverless cars.

title: 42 states suing Meta over addictive features targeting kids
description: A group of 42 attorneys general have filed a lawsuit against Meta, accusing it of "knowingly damaging" the mental health of American teens. The lawsuit says that Facebook and Instagram have profoundly altered the "psychological and social realities of a generation of young Americans."

title: Over 40 states suing Meta over addictive features targeting kids
description: Over 40 attorneys general have filed a lawsuit against Meta, accusing it of "knowingly damaging" the mental health of American teens. The lawsuit says that Facebook and Instagram have profoundly altered the "psychological and social realities of a generation of young Americans."

title: Biden awards medals in science and technology innovation
description: President Joe Biden presented medals to recipients of the National Medal of Science and the National Medal of Technology and Innovation, high honors in the fields of science and engineering.

title: White House names 31 tech hubs across U.S.
description: The Biden administration has named 31 cities across the country as technology hubs, putting them in the running for up to $75 million in grants as part of an effort to develop more companies in places other than just a few big cities.
